title: Echoes of the Eternal Flame
description: In a fractured kingdom on the brink of collapse, ancient elemental forces awaken, threatening to engulf the world in darkness. Players will guide a group of unlikely heroes, each with unique abilities, through a series of pivotal events to prevent the return of the Void Sovereign. The story emphasizes player choice, branching paths, and character-driven narratives.
storyNotes: Act 1 and Act 2 combat mechanics are mostly implemented.
Branching dialogue trees still need additional testing.
Cutscenes for Act 2 are partially completed.

acts.title: The Awakening
acts.overview: Heroes discover the elemental corruption spreading across the land and must unite.
acts.gameplayStyle: Linear exploration with tutorial combat, side quests, and character introductions.
branchingChoices: Player can choose to save the village or pursue the main villain first.

acts.title: Shadows Rising
acts.overview: The Void begins influencing kingdoms. Betrayal and dark forces grow stronger.
acts.gameplayStyle: Open-area missions with side quests, stealth elements, and character-specific story arcs.

acts.title: Fall of the Sovereign
acts.overview: Final confrontation against the Void Sovereign in a collapsing realm. Multiple endings possible.
acts.gameplayStyle: High-intensity boss battles, multi-phase final encounter, and branching ending sequences.
branchingChoices: Ending depends on cumulative player choices across all acts.
